name: Equipped Summons
description: The minions gain the affixes of your $equipSlot.

name: Shredding Summons
description: When the minions hit with melee atks, their target's phys res is slightly reduced until the end of the minion's next turn.

name: Berserking Summons
target: Powers that summon minions that can take phys dmg
description: The minions deal substantially more damage, but have slightly less HP and barely reduced phys res.

name: Exsanguinating Summons
description: When the minions hit with melee atks dealing $physType dmg, their target is inflicted with a DoT dealing slightly less {physType} dmg, stacking until CON save (minion's DC).

name: Phlebotomising Summons
description: The minions deal more $physType damage over time.

name: Sapping Summons
description: When the minions are hit, the offender is slowed until CON save (minion's DC).

name: Charging Summons
description: As an action, the minions can move up to their speed. During this movement, they can move through hostile creatures' spaces. For each creature they move through, they may attack them, dealing slight dmg as $physType on a hit and pushing them 5' in a direction of their choice.

name: Rugged Summons
description: The minions gain +1 to saves vs debuffs.

name: Taunting Summons
description: At the end of the minions' turns, all adj creatures of their choice are taunted by the minion until the end of the minion's next turn.

name: Whirling Summons
description: 1/combat, as an action, the minions can move up to half their speed. During this movement, they can move through hostile creatures' spaces. For each creature they either move through or through an adj space of, they may make a melee wep atk against them, dealing slightly less $physType dmg on a hit.

name: Empowered Summons
description: The minions add $nonPhysType dmg to their hits.

name: Decaying Summons
description: When the minions hit with melee atks, their target is inflicted with a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until DEX save (minion's DC).

name: Dracotouched Summons
description: 1/combat, as a bonus action, the minions breathe a cone of magical energy in a 15' cone, making a spell atk against all foes inside, dealing less dmg as $nonPhysType on a hit.

name: Destructive Summons
description: The limited features of the minions deal slightly more dmg and have slightly larger AoE sizes.

name: Overcharged Summons
description: The limited features of the minions have their cooldowns increased by 1 step, but inflict a DoT dealing $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until DEX save (minion's DC), on hit

name: Reflective Summons
description: The minions gain substantial dmg thorns.

name: Regenerating Summons
description: The minions gain barely any passive regen.

name: Bulky Summons
description: The minions gain more maximum hit points.

name: Reparable Summons
description: The minions gain a slight amount of incoming healing.

name: Solid Summons
description: The minions gain slightly more dmg for each phys dmg type they are either resistant or immune to.

name: Efficiency
target: Powers that can deal dmg and have a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power's cost is 1 step lower, but it deals less dmg.

name: Massive Power
description: The power's largest area deals substantially more dmg.

name: Assassination
description: The power deals substantially more dmg against bosses.

name: Focused Power
description: The power's smallest area deals substantially more dmg.

name: Spread Power
description: The power deals more AoE dmg.

name: Focused Area
description: The power's areas all conform to the same shape and area as one of the original areas of your choice, but it no longer deals any extra crit dmg.

name: Keen Shielding
description: Whenever the power crits, you gain temp HP.

name: Dull Criticals
description: The power has +3 crit range, but no longer deals any extra crit dmg.

name: Keen Recovery
target: Powers that have a non-cooldown resource cost and can deal damage
description: Whenever the power crits, its resource cost is refunded. The power deals less dmg.

name: Murderous Recovery
target: Powers that have a non-cooldown resource cost
description: Whenever the power scores a killing blow, 1 step of its resource cost is refunded.

name: Dull Infliction
target: Powers that can deal dmg and can apply debuffs
description: The power deals less dmg, but any debuffs it can apply have +2 to their DCs.

name: Sapping
description: Whenever the power hits, the target becomes sluggish until the end of your next turn.

name: Focused Sapping
target: Powers that have multiple areas that can hit
description: Whenever the power's smallest area hits, the target becomes sluggish until the end of your next turn.

name: Cruelty
target: Powers that can deal dmg and can apply debuffs
description: Any debuffs the power can apply have +1 to their DCs, and the power deals slightly more dmg to debuffed targets.

name: Massive Infliction
target: Powers that have multiple areas that can hit
description: Whenever the power's largest area hits, it deals more dmg and the target becomes sluggish until the end of your next turn.

name: Spread Infliction
target: Powers that have multiple areas that can hit
description: Whenever the power hits, it deals slightly more dmg and the target become sluggish until the end of your next turn.

name: Whirling Energy
target: Powers that have a non-persistent area
description: After the area resolves, it leaves a vortex of energy, a pers area that lasts until the end of your next turn, making spell atks that deal slight $nonPhysType dmg.

name: Lingering Infliction
description: If you have used the power since the start of your last turn, your DoTs deal barely more dmg and your debuff DCs have a +1 bonus.

name: Focused Whirling
target: Powers that have multiple non-persistent areas
description: Whenever the power's smallest area resolves it leaves a vortex of energy, a pers area that lasts until the end of your next turn, making spell atks that deal $nonPhysType dmg.

name: Persistent Mass
description: The power's persistent areas have slightly more dmg and slightly more area.

name: Massive Energy
target: Powers that have multiple non-persistent areas
description: Whenever the power's largest area resolves it leaves a vortex of energy, a pers area that lasts until the end of your next turn, making spell atks that deal slight $nonPhysType dmg. Additionally, any buffs triggered from the power have slightly more effectiveness.

name: Spread Energy
target: Powers that have multiple non-persistent areas
description: Whenever the power's areas resolve, they leave vortices of energy, pers areas that last until the end of your next turn, making spell atks that deal barely any $nonPhysType dmg. Additionally, any buffs triggered from the power have barely more duration.

name: Focused Efficiency
target: Powers that have multiple areas and a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power's cost is 1 step lower, but its largest area deals substantially less dmg.

name: Major Spread
target: Powers that have multiple areas and a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power's areas deal massively more dmg, but its cost is 1 step higher.

name: Keen Power
description: The power deals barely more dmg and has +1 crit range.

name: Slow Power
description: The power deals substantially more dmg, has +1 Accuracy, and has its usage time increased by 1 action step.

name: Fragmentation
description: Whenever the power's projs hit, they explode in a 15' cone originating from the opposite side of the target. The cone makes a spell atk against all foes, dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg on a hit.

name: Focused Energy
target: Powers with a cooldown and a non-instantaneous duration
description: The power deals more dmg and its cooldown is reduced by 1 step, but its duration is reduced by 1 step.

name: Slow Splitting
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that fire projectiles
description: The power fires 3 additional projs, each aiming 45 degrees in a different direction of your choice from the original projs, but its usage time is increased by 1 action step, its resoure cost is increased by 1 step, and it deals less dmg.

name: Spread
description: The power's cones are 5' wider at all distances.

name: Piercing
description: The power's projectiles are converted to line AoEs but it deals less dmg.

name: Decaying Penetration
description: Each creature hit by the power's lines gets a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save.

name: Endurance
target: Powers with non-instantaneous durations that can deal damage
description: The power's duration increases by 1 step, but it deals less dmg.

name: Clumsy Power
description: The power deals substantially more dmg but has -1 Accuracy.

name: Building Assassination
description: Whenever the power hits a boss, it gains dmg for the remainder of its duration.

name: Building Power
description: Each turn of the power's duration, it gains slightly more dmg.

name: Unstable Speed
target: Powers that do not require concentration and can deal damage
description: The power's usage time is reduced by 2 action steps, but it now requires concentration and deals less dmg.

name: Swift Channelling
target: Powers that require reactivation each round and can deal damage
description: The power's reactivation time is reduced by 1 action step, but it now deals less dmg.

name: Shielding
description: Whenever the power hits, you gain temp HP.

name: Tiring Exertion
target: Powers with non-instantaneous durations that can deal damage
description: For the power's duration, you project a 5' aura that inflicts sluggish on foes until the end of their turn, but the power deals less damage.

name: Intensity
description: The power deals massively more damage, but its duration is reduced by 1 step.

name: Focused Channelling
target: Powers with non-instantaneous durations that require reactivation each round
description: The power's reactivation time is reduced by 1 action step, but you are slowed for its duration.

name: Charged Shielding
target: Powers with cooldowns that can have targeted directions
description: If the power is directed at a non-self target, it projects a 10'-wide magical barrier for the combat that completely blocks projs, in the space in front of you in the targeted direction. The power's cooldown also increases by 1 step.

name: Charged Obstacles
target: Powers that form objs or structs and can deal dmg
description: Any objs or structs formed by the power have their durations extended by 2 steps, but the power's cooldown is increased by 1 step and it deals less damage.

name: Empowering Obstacles
target: Powers that form objs or structs
description: While an obj or struct formed by the power is active, you deal slightly more $nonPhysType dmg and have slightly more {nonPhysType} res.

name: Volatile Obstacles
target: Powers that form objs or structs and can deal dmg
description: When an obj or struct formed by the power expires, it erupts in a staggering explosion. All foes adj to the entity are staggered until the end of your next turn. The power deals massively less damage.

name: Building Ailments
target: Powers with non-instantaneous durations that deal damage
description: For each turn of the power's duration, any debuffs it can apply have +1 to their related DCs. The power deals less damage.

name: Explosive Power
description: Whenever the power hits, a nova erupts from the target, attacking all foes within 5' of the target (including them), dealing 1d4 $nonPhysType spell dmg on a hit. The power deals substantially less dmg.

name: Ailments
description: Any debuffs the power can apply have +1 to their related DCs.

name: Empowering Ailments
description: Whenever the power inflicts a debuff, you deal more spell dmg until the end of your next turn.

name: Sudden Eruption
target: Powers that require reactivation each round and do not have a cone AoE
description: The power's duration is now instantaneous and only activates on casting, but now affects a cone area with length equal to the original range or area length. It also deals substantially more dmg.

name: Inflicting Eruption
description: Any debuffs the power can apply have +1 to their related DCs, and the power deals barely more dmg.

name: Cruel Power
description: The power deals more dmg to debuffed targets.

name: Keen Cruelty
description: The power has +1 crit range against debuffed targets.

name: Speed
description: The power's usage time is reduced by 1 step, but it deals less dmg.

name: Focused Speed
target: Powers that have multiple individual targets
description: The power's usage time is reduced by 1 step and it deals slightly more dmg for each additional individual target it has above 1, but it now only has 1 individual target.

name: Channeling
target: Powers with an instantaneous duration and a non-self/melee range
description: The power's duration becomes 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', and you can reactivate its effect as its usage time throughout the duration. Its range is also halved.

name: Overcharged Penetration
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that require concentration and fire projectiles
description: The power's projectiles are converted to 5'-wide line AoEs and deal more dmg, but its cost is increased by 1 step.

name: Efficient Channeling
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that require concentration and deal dmg
description: The power's cost is 1 step lower, but it deals less dmg.

name: Protective Channeling
description: While concentrating on the power, you have barely more phys res and slightly more $nonPhysType res.

name: Distance
description: The power's range is doubled.

name: Shredding
description: Whenever the power hits, the target's $nonPhysType res is reduced until the end of your next turn.

name: Unstable Focus
target: Powers that have multiple individual targets
description: If all of the power's individual targets are the same, a burst of energy erupts around the target, making a spell atk against all foes within 5' of the target (including them), dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg.

name: Reliable Explosions
target: Powers with sphere areas that trigger from hits
description: The power's sphere areas still trigger even if the required effects do not hit.

name: Telekinesis
description: The power's projectiles have +1 Accuracy.

name: Infliction
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is inflicted with a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until DEX save.

name: Spreading Decay
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is inflicted with a DoT dealing barely any $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until DEX save. Whenever a creature fails to save out of this DoT, it spreads to all creatures of your choice adj to the afflicted creature.

name: Powerful Decay
description: The power's DoTs deal more dmg.

name: Penetration
description: The power ignores dmg res.

name: Precision
description: The power has +1 crit range.

name: Volatile Destruction
description: Whenever the power hits, it deals slight additional $nonPhysType dmg. Additionally, its crits deal slightly more dmg.

name: Distant Power
description: The power's range is doubled and it deals barely more dmg.

name: Overcharged Eruption
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that fire a single projectile
description: The power's proj is converted into a cone with a length equal to the proj's range and deals more dmg, but its cost is increased by 1 step.

name: Keen Lag
description: The power has +3 crit range, but its usage time is increased by 1 step.

name: Dull Debilitation
description: The power can no longer crit, but whenever it usually would, it debilitates the target until CON save.

name: Stacked Focus
description: The power's cone areas are now lines of the same length that activate twice over the same area, but its usage time is increased by 1 step.

name: Blunt Power
description: The power deals massively more dmg, but its line areas are converted to non-piercing projs with range equal to the line's length.

name: Leeching Empowerment
description: Whenever you deal $physType dmg having used the power since the start of your last turn, heal a slight amount of HP.

name: Blunt Eruption
target: Powers with line areas that have a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power's line areas are converted to non-piercing projs with range equal to the line's length and deal less dmg, and its cost is increased by 1 step. Additionally, whenever these projs hit, they splinter into a 15' cone AoE from the other side of the target, a spell atk dealing massive phys dmg.

name: Erupting Power
description: The power's cone areas deal more dmg.

name: Massive Blasting
description: The power's cone areas are longer.

name: Erupting Exsanguination
description: Whenever the power's cone areas hit, the target is inflicted with a DoT dealing slight $physType dmg, stacking until CON save.

name: Erupting Cruelty
description: The power's cone areas deal more dmg against debuffed targets.

name: Keen Eruption
target: Powers with cone areas that make atk rolls
description: The power's cone areas have +1 crit range.

name: Destructive Eruption
description: The power's cone areas deal more crit dmg.

name: Overcharged Splintering
target: Powers with line areas and a non-cooldown resource cost
description: Whenever the power's line areas end, they release a 15' long cone from that point in the same direction as the line, a spell atk against foes dealing substantial $physType dmg. The power's line areas have their lengths halved and its cost is increased by 1 step.

name: Targeted Conclusion
target: Powers with line areas and a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power's line areas are always of a length of your choice, up to their original length, and deal substantially more dmg. The power's cost is increased by 1 step.

name: Close Power
description: The power deals substantially more dmg but its range is halved.

name: Keen Destruction
description: The power has +1 crit range and deals barely more crit dmg.

name: Destruction
description: The power deals more crit dmg.

name: Sacrificial Destruction
description: The power deals substantially more crit dmg, but whenever it crits you lose a slight amount of HP.

name: Keen Support
description: If you have an active minion when you use the power, you gain +1 crit range until the end of your next turn. This does not stack.

name: Overcharged Exsanguination
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that can deal damage
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is inflicted with a DoT that deals substantial $physType dmg, stacking until CON save. The power's cost is increased by 1 step and it deals less dmg.

name: Delayed Leeching
description: Whenever the power hits, you heal HP at the start of your next turn.

name: Healing
description: The power heals more HP.

name: Efficient Healing
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that heal
description: The power's cost is reduced by 1 step, but it heals less HP.

name: Sacrificial Power
description: If you have an active minion when you use the power, the power deals massively more dmg but kills all of your minions.

name: Duplication
description: Whenever you use the power, it is used again at no additional cost, but its dmg is substantially reduced.

name: Reckless Power
target: Powers with areas that can damage allies
description: The power deals substantially more dmg to foes, but massively more dmg to allies.

name: Feasting
description: Whenever you reduce an ally to 0 HP with the power, you heal HP.

name: Bloodthirsty Empowerment
description: Whenever you deal $physType dmg have delivered a KB with the power since the start of your last turn, heal a slight amount of HP.

name: Keen Empowerment
description: If you have delivered a KB with the power since the start of your last turn, you have +1 crit range.

name: Armour Shredding
description: Whenever the power hits, the target gets slightly reduced phys res until the end of your next turn.

name: Conversion
description: The power's base dmg is converted to $nonPhysType and it deals more dmg.

name: Compounding Decay
target: Powers that deal damage over time
description: Whenever the power's DoTs tick, it inflicts the target with a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save.

name: Focused Endurance
target: Powers with non-instantaneous durations that do not require concentration
description: The power's duration is increased by 1 step, but you can only have 1 instance of it active at a time.

name: Channeled Endurance
target: Powers with non-instantaneous durations that do not require concentration
description: The power now lasts for as long as you concentrate on it, and its usage time is reduced by 1 step.

name: Slowing Decay
target: Powers that deal damage over time
description: While a creature is affected by the power's DoT, it is slowed.

name: Sluggish Slowing
description: The power's slow is converted to sluggish.

name: Staggering Decay
target: Powers that deal damage over time
description: While a creature is affected by the power's DoT, it is staggered. The power deals less dmg.

name: Decaying Affliction
target: Powers that deal damage over time
description: While a creature is affected by the power's DoT, it is staggered. The power also has +1 to its ongoing debuff DCs and deals substantially less dmg.

name: Efficient Intensity
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost and non-instantaneous durations
description: The power's cost is 1 step lower and it deals more dmg, but its duration is reduced by 1 step.

name: Decaying Exsanguination
target: Powers that deal damage over time
description: Whenever the power's DoTs tick, it inflicts the target with a DoT dealing slight $physType dmg, stacking until CON save.

name: Drifting
description: The power's persistent areas move 5' away from where you were when they were created at the start of each of your turns.

name: Charged Intensity
target: Powers with a cooldown and a non-instantaneous duration
description: The power can be used an additional time within its cooldown and deals more dmg, but its duration is reduced by 1 step.

name: Slow Efficiency
target: Powers with cooldown and non-cooldown resource costs
description: The power's cooldown and cost are both reduced by 1 step, and it deals more dmg, but its usage time is increased by 2 steps.

name: Intense Power
description: The power's sphere areas deal substantially more dmg, but its sphere areas have less radius.

name: Leeching Decay
target: Powers that deal damage over time
description: Whenever the power's DoTs tick, heal a slight amount of HP.

name: Exposing Decay
target: Powers that deal damage over time
description: Whenever the power's DoTs tick, the target grants incoming atks +1 crit range until the end of your next turn.

name: Shredding Decay
target: Powers that deal damage over time
description: Whenever the power's DoTs tick, the target's phys res is slightly reduced until the end of your next turn.

name: Sapping Decay
target: Powers that deal damage over time
description: Whenever the power's DoTs tick, the target's global dmg is slightly reduced until the end of its next turn.

name: Explosive Area
description: The power's sphere areas have more radius.

name: Explosive Striking
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost
description: Whenever the power creates a sphere area, that area is also assaulted with a barrage of energy from above, making a wep atk against all foes within the sphere that deals $physType dmg. Also, the power deals more dmg and its cost is increased by 1 step.

name: Explosive Rooting
description: Whenever the power creates a sphere area, all foes in that area are rooted until end of their next turn. If an affected foe is a boss, it is slowed instead.

name: Keen Explosions
target: Powers with sphere areas that make atk rolls
description: The power's sphere areas have +1 crit range.

name: Persistent Warding
description: Whenever you end your turn within the power's pers areas, you gain a barely any dmg res and +1 to DEX saves until your next turn.

name: Persistent Empowerment
description: Whenever an ally ends their turn within the power's pers areas, they gain barely any dmg res and +1 to DEX saves until their next turn. Also, the power deals substantially less dmg.

name: Striking
description: Whenever the power hits, it deals additional $physType dmg.

name: Staggering
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is staggered until the end of your next turn.

name: Affliction
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is staggered and sluggish until the end of your next turn. The power also deals less dmg.

name: Inconsistent Eruption
target: Powers with cone areas that require reactivation each round
description: The power's duration is increased by 1 step, and every 3 reactivations its cone areas are larger and deal more dmg. Its other reactivations deal less dmg.

name: Irregular Eruption
target: Powers with cone areas that require reactivation each round
description: Every 3 reactivations, the power's cone areas are larger and deal substantially more dmg.

name: Weaving Eruption
target: Powers with cone areas that require reactivation each round
description: Every 2 reactivations, the power's cone areas are larger and deal more dmg.

name: Stored Energy
target: Powers with cone areas that require reactivation each round
description: For each turn of the power's duration in which you do not reactivate it, your next reactivation's cone areas are larger and deal barely more dmg.

name: Empowering Exsanguiniation
target: Powers that require reactivation each round
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is inflicted with a DoT dealing barely any $physType dmg, stacking until CON save. Additionally, every 3 reactivations, you gain +30' sp until the end of your next turn.

name: Decaying Traps
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is inflicted with a DoT dealing $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save. Additionally, the power deals massively less dmg.

name: Inconsistent Power
target: Powers that require reactivation each round
description: Every 3 reactivations, the power deals massively more dmg. All other reactivations deal barely less dmg.

name: Inconsistent Sapping
target: Powers that require reactivation each round
description: Every 3 reactivations, the power's hits slow the target until the end of your next turn, and inflict a DoT dealing $physType dmg, stacking until CON save.

name: Inconsistent Cruelty
target: Powers that require reactivation each round
description: Every 3 reactivations, the power deals massively more dmg vs debuffed targets.

name: Gated Activation
target: Powers that require reactivation each round
description: Every 3 reactivations, you cannot directly reactivate the power. Instead, it reactivates the next time you teleport. The power deals substantially more dmg.

name: Rapid Shielding
target: Powers that require reactivation each round
description: The power's reactivation time is reduced by 1 step, but it deals substantially less dmg. Additionally, every 3 reactivations, the power's hits grant you a massive amount of temp HP.

name: Blunt Seeking
target: Powers with line areas that require reactivation each round
description: Every 3 reactivations, the power's line areas are converted into non-piercing projs that have +5 Accuracy.

name: Inconsistent Penetration
target: Powers that fire non-piercing projectiles and require reactivation each round
description: Every 3 reactivations, the power's projs are converted into line areas with length of the proj's range and deal more dmg.

name: Empowered Power
description: The power's dmg deals slightly more dmg while you are buffed. This bonus is doubled while you are in a pers area.

name: Splintering Summons
description: Whenever the minions die, they leave behind a chunk of metal. The next time you reactivate a power that requires reactivation each round, the chunk flies at you, creating a line area between its location and you, making wep atks against all foes and dealing slight $physType dmg.

name: Bursting Empowerment
description: Whenever a single use of the power hits 1+ target, you gain barely any dmg res and +1 to DEX saves until the end of your next turn.

name: Narrowed Power
description: The power's cone areas are converted into 10'-wide line areas that deal barely more dmg.

name: Specialised Inevitability
description: While you are wielding a $weaponClass weapon, the power's hits give a stack of Invevitability. Whenever a creature reaches 4 stacks of Inevitability, make a wep atk against them, dealing massive $physType dmg.

name: Planted Whirling
description: Whenever the power's line areas end, they conjure a 5'x5' whirling chunk of metal that remains as a pers area until the end of your next turn. The area makes wep atks that deal barely any $physType dmg.

name: Overwhelming Persistence
target: Powers with persistent areas that deal damage
description: The power's persistent areas' durations are increased by 1 step and have more area, but deal substantially less dmg.

name: Creeping Persistence
description: The power's persistent areas move 5' towards their nearest foes at the start of each of your turns.

name: Controlled Power
description: You can change the power's line areas to be any length up to their maximum whenever you create them and they deal barely more dmg.

name: Careful Trapping
description: Whenever the power's line areas end, they leave behind a trap that triggers whenever a creature starts their turn or moves within 5' of it. The traps also trigger at the end of your next turn if they haven't done so already. The traps make a wep atk against all foes within 5' of them, dealing slight $physType dmg and slight $nonPhysType dmg. Also, the power's usage time is increased by 1 step.

name: Patient Trapping
description: For every round that the trap is armed and not triggered, it gains barely more detonation area and barely more dmg.

name: Eruption
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that target a single point
description: A nova of metal erupts from the power's target, making a spell atk against all foes adj to the target dealing $physType dmg. Additionally, the power's cost is increased by 1 step.

name: Explosive Exsanguination
description: Whenever the power's sphere areas hit, the target is inflicted with a DoT dealing slight $physType dmg, stacking until CON save.

name: Decaying Empowerment
description: If you have used the power since the start of your last turn, your DoTs deal more dmg.

name: Bombarding Penetration
target: Powers that fire multiple non-piercing projectiles and deal damage
description: The power's projs are converted to line areas with length equal to the proj's range, but they deal less dmg.

name: Blasting Power
description: The power's sphere areas deal more dmg.

name: Massive Debilitation
description: The power has barely more area and whenever it hits it debilitates the target until the end of your next turn.

name: Massive Support
description: If you have an active minion when you use the power, it gets more area.

name: Chaining Boons
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that target a single ally
description: The power can target 1 additional ally within range and deals more dmg, but its cost is increased by 1 step.

name: Supported Power
description: If you have an active minion when you use the power, it gets more dmg.

name: Bloody Death
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost
description: Whenever the power scores a killing blow, it consumes 1 additional step of its resource cost to conjure a CR 1 Blood Spectre from the corpse, which is an undead minion that deals $physType dmg.

name: Leeching Summons
description: Whenever the minions hit, they heal a slight amount of HP.

name: Efficient Summons
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that summon minions
description: The power's cost is reduced by 1 step, and whenever the minions hit, they inflict the target with a DoT dealing slight $physType dmg, stacking until CON save (minion's DC). Additionally, the minions deal substantially less dmg.

name: Powerful Summons
description: The minions have slightly more HP and deal slightly more dmg.

name: Gargantuan Summons
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that summon minions
description: The minions have substantially more dmg, more HP, and are 1 step larger, but the power's cost is increased by 1 step.

name: Energy
description: Whenever the power hits, it deals additional $nonPhysType dmg.

name: Decay
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is inflicted with a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until DEX save.

name: Efficient Empowerment
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that deal damage
description: The power's cost is reduced by 1 step, and if you have used the power since the start of your last turn, you deal more DoT dmg. Additionally, the power deals substantially less dmg.

name: Investment
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power deals massively more dmg, but its cost is increased by 1 step.

name: Eradication
description: The power deals more dmg if the target cannot sense any of its own allies within 60' of it.

name: Desperation
description: The power deals more dmg against healthy targets while you are bloodied.

name: Mass Sapping
description: You project an aura while the power is active that slows adj foes.

name: Persistent Shredding
description: Foes in the power's pers areas have slightly less phys res.

name: Shredding Ailments
description: Instead of inflicting DoTs, the power marks targets such that whenever they take phys dmg, they take additional base dmg equal to the DoT's original dmg.

name: Persistent Exsanguination
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is inflicted with a DoT dealing slight $physType dmg, stacking until CON save.

name: Ultimate Persistence
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that create persistent areas and deal damage
description: The power's persistent areas tick thrice at the start of each of your turns, in addition to their usual tick, but whenever they do so, they consume the power's cost again. Additionally, the power deals less dmg.

name: Sacrificial Persistence
target: Powers that create persistent areas which can damage you
description: The power's persistent areas tick twice at the start of each of your turns, in additional to their usual tick, but whenever they do so, they tick once against you, regardless of your location. Additionally, the power deals less dmg.

name: Intense Persistence
target: Powers that create persistent areas and deal damage
description: The power's persistent areas tick at the start of each of your turns, in additional to their usual tick, but they deal less dmg.

name: Persistent Doom
target: Powers that create persistent areas which can damage you
description: The power's persistent areas tick thrice at the start of each of your turns, in additional to their usual tick, but whenever they do so, they tick a number of times against you equal to the number of complete rounds the area has been active, regardless of your location. Additionally, the power deals less dmg.

name: Enduring Ailments
description: Any debuffs the power can apply have +1 to their ongoing DCs.

name: Terror
description: Whenever you use the power, all foes adj to you are frightened until the end of their next turn.

name: Incubating Resilience
description: For the power's duration, you have more $nonPhysType res. Additionally, whenever the power ends, you heal barely any HP.

name: Explosive Decay
description: Whenever you use the power, energy erupts from you, inflicting a DoT dealing barely any $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save, on all adj foes.

name: Growth
description: The power has more area.

name: Contagious Decay
target: Powers with a non-instantaneous duration that deal damage
description: For the power's duration, you project a 5' aura that inflicts foes with a DoT dealing barely any $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save. Whenever a creature fails to save out of this DoT, it spreads to all creatures of your choice adj to them. Additionally, the power deals less dmg.

name: Volatile Persistence
description: 1/turn, when a creature dies within the power's pers areas, their corpse emits a nova of energy, which inflicts a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save, on all creatures of your choice adj to it.

name: Charged Explosions
target: Powers with sphere areas and a cooldown that deal damage
description: The power's cooldown is reduced by 1 step, but it deals less damage.

name: Resistance
description: For the power's duration, you have substantially more $nonPhysType res.

name: Persistent Erosion
description: Foes within the power's pers areas have less $nonPhysType res.

name: Decaying Bolts
description: At the start of each of your turns during the power's duration, you fire a bolt of energy at the nearest foe in LoS, inflicting a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save.

name: Rapid Missiles
target: Powers that fire projectiles and deal damage
description: The power's usage time is reduced by 1 step, but it deals less dmg.

name: Persistent Sacrifice
description: You and foes within the power's pers areas have substantially less $nonPhysType res.

name: Malevolent Shredding
description: For the power's duration, whenever you are hit, the offender is cursed with slightly reduced dmg res for the rest of the combat.

name: Sacrificial Decay
description: For the power's duration, whenever you are hit, the offender is inflicted with a DoT dealing substantial $nonPhysType dmg and you are inflicted with a DoT dealing $nonPhysType dmg, both stacking until CON save.

name: Malevolent Absorption
description: For the power's duration, whenever you are hit, you pull energy from all adj cursed foes, a spell atk dealing barely any $nonPhysType dmg and granting you temp HP for each target hit.

name: Persistent Restoration
description: You and allies within the power's pers areas gain barely any passive regen. This regen is doubled while you are bloodied.

name: Persistent Exploitation
description: Your minions within the power's pers areas inflict a DoT on hit dealing $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save (minion's DC), but are inflicted with a DoT dealing slight {type} dmg, stacking until CON save, whenever the area ticks (your DC).

name: Persistent Control
description: Your minions within the power's pers areas deal more $nonPhysType dmg.

name: Constant Trapping
description: At the start of each of your turns during the power's duration, you drop an energy trap. At the start of your next turn, the trap is triggered and all foes adj to it are inflicted with a DoT dealing barely any $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save.

name: Stacked Intensity
target: Powers with cone areas that deal damage
description: The power's cone areas are converted into 5'-wide lines of the same length that apply twice, but the power deals substantially less dmg.

name: Focused Return
description: The power's cone areas are converted into 10'-wide line areas of the same length that apply again from their endpoint to your location at the start of your next turn, regardless of length. Additionally, the power deals substantially more dmg, but its usage time is increased by 2 steps.

name: Building Penetration
target: Powers with line areas that originate from you
description: The power's line areas deal more dmg against targets 30+' away from you.

name: Massive Overcharging
target: Powers with cone areas and a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power's cone areas are massively longer, but its cost is increased by 1 step.

name: Shielding Missiles
description: The power's projs instead fly around you, atking as if they were a 5' aura. The projs can still only atk their usual number of times before being destroyed.

name: Persistent Endurance
target: Powers with persistent areas that deal damage
description: The power's persistent areas' durations are increased by 1 step, but they deal less dmg.

name: Armoured Persistence
description: While the power's persistent areas are active, you have slightly more phys res.

name: Exposure
description: Whenever the power hits, the target gets slighly reduced $physType and $nonPhysType res until the end of your next turn.

name: Chaining
target: Powers with cone areas and a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power's cone areas are converted to chaining projs with range equal to the cone's length, but its cost is increased by 1 step. Additionally, the power deals barely more crit dmg.

name: Energy Exposure
description: Whenever the power hits, the target's $nonPhysType res is barely reduced and it has -1 to debuff saves until the end of your next turn.

name: Efficient Power
target: Powers with a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power deals more dmg and its cost is reduced by 1 step, but its usage time is increased by 1 step.

name: Planned Retreat
target: Powers with a targeted direction and a cooldown
description: Whenever you use the power, you shift up 20' away from the targeted direction in a straight line, but its cooldown is increased by 1 step.

name: Alacrity
description: If the power is used and hits 1+ target, you gain +10' speed until the end of the turn.

name: Blinding
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

name: Rooting
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is rooted until the end of their next turn.

name: Erosion
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is inflicted with a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save.

name: Explosions
description: The power's cone areas are converted into self-burst spheres with radius equal to the cone's length.

name: Exsanguination
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is inflicted with a DoT dealing slight $physType dmg, stacking until CON save.

name: Potential
description: The power can have 2 additional tome upgrades applied to it.

name: Shifting Summoning
description: Whenever the shapeshift's melee wep atks hit, your active minions gain global dmg until you take a LR, but these melee wep atks gain a 4+ recharge. If the atks are unusable on a turn due to this cooldown, a new power can be used in its place that conjures a Locust, a CR 1/4 minion that deals $physType dmg and gains a permanent -1 passive regen at the start of each of its turns.

name: Shifting Feasting
description: Whenever the shapeshift's powers or minions score a KB, or hit a boss, you heal barely any HP and double the shapeshift's max duration.

name: Shifting Tornadoes
description: Every 5 hits the shapeshift's melee wep atks score, the max duration of the shapeshift is halved to conjure a tornado of energy in the target's space, a 5x5' pers area that moves 5' in a random dir at the start of each of your turns and makes spell atks that deal substantial $physType dmg.

name: Persistent Power
description: The power's pers areas deal more dmg.

name: Shifting Unity
description: The shapeshift and its minions deal barely any additional $physType dmg with hits. Additionally, while it has an active minion, the shapeshift's DoTs deal barely more dmg.

name: Keen Shifting
target: Powers that shapeshift into forms that can deal dmg
description: The shapeshift and its minions have +1 crit range. Additionally, the shapeshift deals less dmg.

name: Shifting Endurance
description: Whenever the shapeshift or its minions crit, the shapeshift's maximum duration is doubled.

name: Summoning Shifting
description: The shapeshift's minions have less dmg and massively less max HP, but they have +10' reach and are 1 size larger.

name: Swarming Persistence
description: The shapeshift's pers areas count as a swarm of untargetable minions dealing using the pers area's ticks instead of you.

name: Shifting Leeching
description: Whenever the shapeshift's pers areas tick, it heals a slight amount of HP.

name: Supported Decay
description: If the shapeshift has an active minion when it creates a pers area, the area deals slightly more dmg and for its duration, the shapeshift's hits inflict a DoT dealing barely any $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save.

name: Pooling Shifting
description: The durations of the shapeshift's pers areas are increased by 1 step. Additionally, its melee wep atks deal massively more dmg but their usage time is increased by 2 steps.

name: Persistent Shifting
description: Whenever the shapeshift scores a melee wep hit, the max durations of its active pers areas are quadrupled and you revert out of the shapeshift.

name: Savage Shifting
description: The shapeshift's melee wep hits deal barely more dmg and double the max duration of the shapeshift.

name: Supportive Shifting
description: Whenever the shapeshift makes a melee wep atk, a random one of its active minions can react to make a single atk. The shapeshift deals substantially less dmg.

name: Defensive Shifting
description: The shapeshift and its minions have +1 to DEX saves and slightly more phys res, but it deals less dmg.

name: Heavy Shifting
description: The shapeshift has -1 to DEX saves and additional phys res.

name: Enduring Shifting
description: Whenever the shapeshift passes a DEX save, its max duration is doubled.

name: Swirling Shifting
description: Whenever the shapeshift makes a charged melee wep atk, its max duration is halved to surround itself with swirling energy, projecting a 5' aura that makes spell atks against foes dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg for combat (dmg stacks).

name: Shifting Summons
description: The shapeshift's minions have slightly more dmg and more max HP.

name: Rejuvenating Shifting
description: Whenever the shapeshift summons a minion, it heals a slight amount of HP and its max duration is doubled, but it deals less dmg.

name: Staggering Shifting
description: The shapeshift and its minions stagger targets for 1 round on hit.

name: Flagellating Shifting
description: Whenever the shapeshift hits its minions with a melee wep atk, the target gains substantially more dmg for the combat. Additionally, the shapeshift deals less dmg.

name: Summoned Bombs
description: The shapeshift's minions can no longer take actions. Instead, at the start of each of their turns, they release a nova of metal, making spell atks against all foes adj to them dealing $physType dmg.

name: Rapid Summoning
description: The shapeshift's powers that summon minions have their usage times reduced by 1 step. Additionally, the shapeshift's pers areas contain an untargetable, immobile CR 1/8 beast minion, a locust, at their centre that deals $physType dmg. The shapeshift deals substantially less dmg.

name: Summoning Reversion
description: Whenever the shapeshift summons a minion, you revert out of the shapeshift and the minion is replaced with an immobile Healing Totem, a CR 1/4 construct minion that deals a quarter of its dmg as healing.

name: Decaying Shifting
description: The shapeshift and its minions inflict their targets with a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save, on hit.

name: Shifting Alacrity
description: The shapeshift's powers have their usage times reduced by 1 step, but they deal less dmg.

name: Exsanguinating Shifting
description: The shapeshift's melee wep hits and minions inflict their targets with a DoT dealing slight $physType dmg, stacking until CON save, on hit.

name: Raw Shifting
description: Whenever the shapeshift creates a pers area, all debuffs the shapeshift has applied in this combat are removed and the pers area deals slightly more dmg and has slightly more area.

name: Reaching Summons
description: The minions have +5' reach and deal barely more dmg.

name: Roguish Summons
description: As a movement action 1/combat, the minions can teleport to a space they can see that is adj to a foe. Additionally, as an action, they can throw metal at a target within 120', making a thrown wep atk that deals $physType dmg.

name: Summoned Decay
description: As an action, the minions can throw metal at a target within 120', making a thrown wep atk dealing substantially less $physType dmg, inflicting the target with a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save (minion's DC), and giving them slightly less phys res until the end of the minion's next turn.

name: Solo Summons
target: Powers that summon minions which have cooldowns
description: The minions' cooldowns are reduced by 1 step and they deal more dmg, but their powers' usage times are increased by 1 step. Additionally, while the minion is active, you cannot have any other active minions.

name: Rebirth
target: Powers that summon minions which deal damage
description: Whenever the minions die, they are resummoned at the end of your next turn (after their turn would be). The minions deal less dmg.
